0011001001000001 0101110011001001 1 -> sum: 1000111100001011, cout: 0
0101111110111001 0001001001001111 0 -> sum: 0111001000001000, cout: 0
1111010011010011 1001011011100111 1 -> sum: 1000101110111011, cout: 1

0111001001100101 0100100000101100 1 -> sum: 1011101010010010, cout: 0
1111101000100100 1000100111000111 1 -> sum: 1000001111101100, cout: 1
